name: Deep Space Colony Program
description:
This virtual novel explores what it would be like to be an artificial intelligence on your first day of "Life". Set in the distant future this Sci-Fi story goes into telling the tale of a future race of androids who document the universe.

Game Features:

-Short game play (Approx. 20 Mins)
-Visual Novel
-Custom Soundtrack made in Fruity Loops
-Several open source artworks from https://pixabay.com/ are used in the game.

I wanted to make a game that would branch what I do into the great art at https://pixabay.com/. I was inspired by these pictures to tell this story. I hope you enjoy it as much as I did making it!
